positive_examples: This is an example of hamiltonian system.
The hamiltonian system demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed hamiltonian system in this context.
A typical case of hamiltonian system would involve these features.
The concept of hamiltonian system applies here.
A dynamical system governed by Hamilton's equations, typically representing conservative mechanical systems.
negative_examples: This is an example of multi stable system, not hamiltonian system.
This represents dynamical system in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MultiStableSystem, or other types of DynamicalSystem

definition: A dynamical system describable by Hamilton's equations of classical mechanics.
